description: First column of array associated with reverse lexicographically justified array.
references: C. Kimberling, "Orderings of the set of all positive Fibonacci sequences," in G. E. Bergum et al., editors, Applications of Fibonacci Numbers, Vol. 5 (1993), pp. 405-416.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
